review: I love the fire stick but my only issue is that the remote often gets stuck.  I would have Amazon rework the remote in the next gen of this product.Other than that, I love the HD quality and streaming.  The apps are good as well.

review: Sounds and video sometimes doesn't  match but easy reset fixes that. Think it's more my tv and internet. Other then that works great.

review: The Fire TV Stick apps need to be updated with VUDU and STARZ.  I have a Chormecast and these apps are available.
author: Michael Hall

review: Everything I want to access is working great
author: vam

review: The Fire Stick picture quality has been glitchy.  In using the Netflix and Hulu apps, the videos frequently pause.  Sometimes it happens throughout the entire show, and sometimes it does not occur at all.  Other times the picture quality randomly changes from HD to grainy and back to HD.  I am currently troubleshooting this problem.Otherwise, it has been easy to set up and use.  The apps available are great.  I have used it since Christmas and if I can get the problem worked out I would rate it a 5.
author: Sari Winham

review: We have Google Fiber installed. If I don't shut down virtually everything going to the Google Fiber boxes (meaning stop all streaming on the system), the Fire TV Stick can't get enough bandwidth to show anything. Kind of an either/or situation. It would be nice if one person could be watching something on Google Fiber on one box while another is watching something on the Fire TV Stick. My son-in-law got a Roku. That seems to have been a better solution.
